The New York Yankees swept the 5 game series with the Boston Red Sox and have a 6.5 game lead in the East.

in Boston too. They were brutally beaten as well. They were outscored really bad, don't remember the exact numbers, but it was almost twice as much as Boston scored. New York showed to be the better team and took a commanding lead in the AL East.

what a surprise...this only happens EVERY YEAR. The Red Sox always hold the top of the AL East until August when they start to slump a little and then they have a series with the Yankees where it is all over. The Red Sox nose dive is more predictable than a sunrise.
